definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: People can't see the sun all day and all night.
sentences.chinese: 特罗姆瑟人把这一天叫做“太阳日”。

sentences.english: The daily rising of the sun provided a short unit of time, the solar day .
sentences.chinese: 每天太阳崛起提供了单位时间短，太阳日。

sentences.english: After 549 solar days his crew mates came back to take him home.
sentences.chinese: 过了549个太阳日，他的队员回到火星带他回家。

sentences.english: In everyday life, in order to level the length of the solar day basis.
sentences.chinese: 在日常生活中，以平太阳日的长度为基础。

sentences.english: The day of a the sun is the Earth to round the sun turns a time for need length.
sentences.chinese: 一个太阳日就是地球绕太阳转一周所需的时间长度。

definition: the sidereal year (astronomy)/the year defined in terms of the fixed stars
perihelion, the nearest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/lower apsis
the solar year/the year defined as the period between successive equinoxes
sun/CL:個|个[ge4]/abbr. for 太陽穴|太阳穴[tai4 yang2 xue2]
aphelion, the furthest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/opposite: perihelion 近日點|近日点[jin4 ri4 dian3]/higher apsis

pinyin: Ge2 lin2 ni2 zhi4 Biao1 zhun3 shi2 jian1

definition: Chunfen or Spring Equinox, 4th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st March-4th April
Qiufen or Autumn Equinox, 16th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd September-7th October
